column3: There is a sword in the room.
There is a dagger lying on the ground.
A shield rests against the wall.
You see a green potion on a table in the room.
There is a stick on the ground.
The gods have mercy on you! There is a RedBull on a shelf!
A big stick lies discarded on the floor.
There's a piece of paper on the table. Careful! It's sharp!
Someone's broken broom rests forgotten in the corner.
A jar of glue sits on a desk.
There's a bag of things in front of the shelf.
The bookshelf contains "Weaponized Math" as one of its titles.
